Biography

Profile

I was born and raised in Colombia, moved to the United States when I was 17 years old. In my down time, I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my skills. I also like to network with other colleagues and spend quality time with my family and fiancée.

Objective

I am a Junior Front End Developer. I have worked in a range of projects from customizing user experience with esignature services to building responsive financial loan applications including, Apple Inc. I am seeking a role where I am given the opportunity to aid in fulfilling the organization’s needs, as I expand my experience, skills, and expertise.

Projects

Apple

A finance web application that is being used in the apple stores in the UK for customers to apply for financial credit when purchasing an apple item.

Offline Application

A finance web appplication that does not need internet access for the end user to submit an application.

Electronic Signing

An integration tool used by different areas of the bank in order to sign documents electronically within the business or by customers.
